attributes.review: The first time I opened the app, i saw trumps face. Knowing I wouldn’t last more than .00001 seconds looking at his ugly face, i closed it. The next day, my dog and cat died. Later on, my brother got hit by a bus. He’s in the hospital right now. At five pm, a tree fell on top of my house and shattered the windows in my room. I thought it couldn’t get worse. But when I went to sleep, I saw his face in my nightmare. The fat orange president was laughing and saying “China China China China”. Coincidence? I THINK NOT!
attributes.title: THE APP IS CURSED I DO NOT RECCOMEND

attributes.review: it made my phone glitch out like crazy. my battery drains every time i use the app. i was really disappointed because i love trump and would really like him to win the 2020 election. but anyways, when i found out trump wants to delete tiktok it really made me question if i really stand by him in this election. it’s a fun app for kids and would only cause and create more chaos if it were deleted. i think that he’s mostly butt hurt about the fact that a bunch of the kids on there reserved tickets for his rally and didn’t show up, because he didn’t have a problem with the app before that.
